ComicInfo.Summary:
END OF STORY ARC
THE WAY OUT OF THE SMOGZONE IS BLOCKED!
The O and his Robo-Cops have tracked down Lupa. SuperCarStar™ cannot be outdriven. Hybrid’s lost his head. There’s no way into the O-Zone! It’s the finale of PETROL HEAD’s thrilling first arc. Can he find one last cheat mode?
“PETROL HEAD is my favorite new comic of the year. Full stop. It’s my favorite new original comic in a good long while, in fact.“ —Comics Beat

ComicInfo.Title: ...The City Is All
